title: Jalapeño Sausage Pizza with 3 Cheese Jalapeño Ranch Sauce
directions: Heat a large skillet on the stovetop over medium high heat.
Add the sausage to the skillet and cook through.
Heat a large saucepan on the stove over medium heat.
Add the cream cheese and chicken broth, whisk together as the cream cheese melts.
Once smooth, add the parmesan and ½ cup mozzarella cheese, continue whisking while the cheese melts into the sauce.
Add the jalapeño ranch dressing and whisk all of the ingredients together.
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
Roll the pizza dough out on a baking sheet.
Pour the 3 cheese jalapeño ranch sauce onto the pizza dough.
Top with the cooked sausage and sliced jalapeños.
Sprinkle the remaining ¼ cup of mozzarella cheese on top and place in the oven to bake for 12-15 minutes.
ingredients: ¾ cup Litehouse OPA Jalapeño Ranch Dressing
